Ixtapa.title: Ixtapa
Ixtapa.byline: Ixtapa is a resort town on the Pacific Coast of Mexico in the state of Guerrero.

Ixtapan de la Sal.title: Ixtapan de la Sal
Ixtapan de la Sal.byline: Ixtapan de la Sal is a city of 11,000 (2010) in Mexico.

Ixtlán del Rio.title: Ixtlán del Rio
Ixtlán del Rio.byline: Ixtlán del Rio is a small town in the southeast corner of Mexico's Pacific coast state of Nayarit.
